::KitKat::

Watches Drilbit.  She smiles at him.  She knew she had picked the 
rignt bot for her when she saw him defend her like that.  

She walked back to Land Mine. "See? Neither him nor I will let you 
just out towards your doom.  We protect our own." She put a 
reasurring hand on Land Mine's shoulder


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Thank you, darling." He said, to KitKat. He walked right up to the
> Maximal. He looked the bot streight in the eye. His optics glowed 
bright
> red. 
> "This is for insulting my lady." He sayd.
> DrillBit suddenly through a uppercut at the bot.
